company.name: SENS - Iqony Solar Energy Solutions
company.description:
Iqony Solar Energy Solutions GmbH - brand name SENS - (formerly STEAG Solar Energy Solutions) is a global service provider in the field of renewable energy headquartered in Würzburg. With more than 8,000 installations in around 40 countries, we have solid industry experience, especially in the photovoltaic sector.

In our four business areas - the project business with large solar parks (Utility Scale), the industrial solutions (Commercial & Industrial), the services (Operation & Maintenance) as well as our energy efficiency (OPTENDA) offerings - we develop reliable solutions for our customers day by day.
What distinguishes the company, is the particular passion and dedication of the experienced team. Be part of it too!
 
As an attractive employer in Wuerzburg SENS offers a huge variety of career opportunities in an international, growth-driven environment. We offer a fair remuneration and flat hierarchies. We also rely on an active health management and a working environment with Good Energy. 

We are awarded as fair company and FOCUS Top-Employer Medium Sized 2023 and are part of the corporate network "Erfolgsfaktor Familie" (success factor family).
